shortdesc.ph: The relative location of the screen-shared area to the screen or window. If you do not set this parameter, the SDK shares the whole screen or window.

p.codeblock: struct Rectangle { int x; int y; int width; int height; Rectangle(): x(0), y(0), width(0), height(0) {} Rectangle(int xx, int yy, int ww, int hh): x(xx), y(yy), width(ww), height(hh) {} };
export interface Rectangle { x: number; y: number; width: number; height: number; }

plentry.pd: The horizontal offset from the top-left corner.
The vertical offset from the top-left corner.
The width of the shared area.
The height of the shared area.
